_design_notes.project_name: Dead Don't Talk (Junior High 2000 Words Ver.)
_design_notes.difficulty_focus: Clear pronunciation, Basic Numbers, Family, Body parts

word_selection_rules.source: 教育部國中參考字彙表 (2000字)
exclude: 單音節且易混淆字 (e.g., pen, bus, cat, one, two)
發音特徵不明顯的短字 (e.g., at, it, of, in)
同音異義字干擾強的字 (e.g., meat/meet, see/sea)
include: 多音節單字 (e.g., eleven, beautiful, tomato)
發音響亮、清晰的雙音節字 (e.g., shoulder, tiger, market)
長度較長但結構簡單的字 (e.g., afternoon, basketball)
word_selection_rules.difficulty_progression: Level 越高，單字音節越長、重音變化越複雜、詞意越抽象。

sentence_writing_rules.formatting: Sentence Case (Sentences MUST start with a Capital Letter)
sentence_writing_rules.note: Ensure sentences are natural to speak and contain target vocabulary.
